summary: Antoine Doinel works dying flowers in the courtyard outside his apartment. He is married to Christine, who is pregnant. He has an affair with a Japanese woman, jeopardising his marriage.
cast: Jean-Pierre Léaud|Claude Jade|Hiroko Berghauer|Barbara Laage|Danièle Girard|Daniel Ceccaldi|Claire Duhamel|Daniel Boulanger|Silvana Blasi|Pierre Maguelon|Jacques Jouanneau|Claude Véga|Jacques Rispal|Jacques Robiolles|Pierre Fabre|Christian de Tillière|Billy Kearns|Anik Belaubre|Marianne Piketti|Guy Piérauld|Marie Dedieu|Marie Iracane|Yvon Lec|Ernest Menzer|Christophe Vesque|Emilie Barbault|Marcel Berbert|Jacques Cottin|Frédérique Dolbert|Nicole Félix|Rosa Guiñón|Miss Irakane|Iska Khan|Ada Lonati|Philippe Léotard|Nobuko Maki|Marcel Mercier|Joseph Mériau|Jérôme Richard|Serge Rousseau|Helen Scott|Albert Trifol|François Truffaut
title: Domicilio conyugal
